text.section: An entrance or exit fee is prohibited.

A fee may not be charged:
In connection with the renewal of a rental agreement; or
To determine if a resident is qualified under § 8A-202(c) of this title.
Except if a material change results in the deterioration of the home, a park owner may not charge a fee for inspecting a home for resale more than one time within a 12-month period.
The fee for inspecting a home for resale may not exceed $60.
